verbs.description: SINGAPORE -- President Donald Trump and North Korea 's Kim Jong Un [V: will] start their historic summit with a one - on - one session with translators . A U.S. official says Monday that the leaders will meet for up to two hours before an expanded bilateral meeting with their respective advisers .

A U.S. official says Monday that the leaders will meet for up to two hours before an expanded bilateral meeting with their respective advisers .
